name: Perl Executable File
summary: Learn about .PLX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Perl scripts can be run on Windows IIS systems using Perl for ISAPI (Internet Server Application Programming Interface) or with ActivePerl.
The standard way of naming Perl files is .PM for Perl modules, .PL for Perl libraries, and PLX for executable Perl scripts.

description: Executable program written in the Perl programming language; often used for Web applications that are run on a Web server, but may be run on any system that includes a Perl interpreter.
